title: The Persona Hack
code:
Act as an expert [ROLE, e.g., 'growth marketer', 'CFO', 'narrative designer']...

Your goal is to [TASK, e.g., 'write a high-converting ad campaign']...

title: The Follow-Up Suffix
code:
[YOUR PROMPT GOES HERE]

...Before you answer, ask me 3 critical follow-up questions to ensure your response is perfectly tailored to my needs.

title: The Format Constraint
code:
[YOUR PROMPT GOES HERE]

...Format your entire response as a [FORMAT, e.g., 'Markdown table', 'JSON object', '3-slide presentation outline'].
